comment.author: 36720649@N05
comment._content: This image is in great condition given it's age.  I like the clean vignette from foreground to background, the two beautiful cars, the gent in the fedora and the crisp handwriting.  This is truly excellent.

comment.author: 69135870@N00
comment._content: Took me a while, but I finally saw that the handwriting was... handwriting rather than something on the road!

comment.realname: State Library of New South Wales
comment.author: 29454428@N08
comment._content:
Dear Mendhak,
Yes unfortunately the writing is on the negative as it is a postcard collection. Identification of the images was easy, however.
